code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";export function useFetch(url){const[data,setData]=useState({});const[isLoading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{if(!url)return;async function fetchData(){const response=await fetch(url);const data=await response.json();setData(data);setLoading(false);}setLoading(true);fetchData();},[url]);return{isLoading,data};}
